thread.title: Abu Dhabi 1st Test: England Captain Cook leads fightback against Pakistan
thread.title_full: Abu Dhabi 1st Test: England Captain Cook leads fightback against Pakistan - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Abu Dhabi 1st Test: England Captain Cook leads fightback against Pakistan
text: 15 Oct 2015In the first cricket Test against Pakistan at Abu Dhabi , England captain Alastair Cook has dished out a resolute century to lead his team's remarkable fightback. Replying to Pakistan's mammoth first innings score of 523 for 8 declared, England were 290 for three at close on the third day on a flat Sheik Zayed Stadium pitch. Â»
